effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 20% chance to lower the target’s Defense by one stage.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 20% chance to lower the target’s Defense by one stage.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 20% chance to lower the target’s Defense by one stage.

short_effect.sun_moon: Has a 20% chance to lower the target’s Defense by one stage.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Has a 20% chance to lower the target’s Defense by one stage.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Has a 20% chance to lower the target’s Defense by one stage.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user attacks by beating the target with a bone that contains a spirit. This may also lower the target’s Defense stat.
